pages.text: And Pharaoh said: bring me every knowledgeable magician
And when the magicians came, Moses told them: throw what you want to throw
When they threw, Moses said: what you brought is the magic, indeed God is going to make it useless. Indeed God does not improve the work of the corruptors
God proves the truth with His words, even if the guilty ones dislike it

No one believed in Moses except a group of descendants of his people, because of fear of Pharaoh and his assembly that they persecute them. Indeed Pharaoh was powerful on the earth and he was among the excessive ones
And Moses said: my people, if you believe in God, then put your trust in Him if you are submitted
Then they said: we put our trust in God, our Master, do not make us a test for the wrongdoing people
and save us from the disbelieving people by Your mercy

And We revealed to Moses and his brother: settle your people in Egypt's houses, and make your houses face each other (or make them places of worship) and perform the mandatory prayer, and give good news to the believers

And Moses said: our Master, you gave Pharaoh and his assembly luxury and wealth in this worldâ€™s life; our Master, they misguide (people) from your way; our Master, destroy their wealth and harden their hearts for they will not believe until they see the painful punishment
